title: Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) Regulations 2020 to 2023”
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Official
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Official 
Controls in relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal 
Origin) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2023. 

(2) The citation “the European Union (Official Controls in relation to Food 
Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) Regulations 2020 to 2023” 
includes these Regulations.

title: Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) Regulations 2020 to 2023”
heading: In these Regulations –
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations – 

“Principal Regulations” means the European Union (Official Controls in 
relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) 
Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 575 of 2020); 

“Regulations of 2023” means the European Union (Official Controls in 
relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 50 of 2023).

heading: 3. Regulation 2(1) (as amended by Regulation 4 of the Regulations of 2023)
text_raw:
3. Regulation 2(1) (as amended by Regulation 4 of the Regulations of 2023) 

of the Principal Regulations is amended— 

(a) 

by substituting for the definition of “Annex I to EU Regulation 
2019/1793” the following: 

“‘Annex I to EU Regulation 2019/1793’ means Annex I to EU 
Regulation 2019/1793 as inserted by Article 1(3) of Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2023/1110 of 6 June 20231;”, 

(b) by substituting for the definition of “Annex II to EU Regulation 

2019/1793” the following: 

“‘Annex II to EU Regulation 2019/1793’ means Annex II to EU 
Regulation 2019/1793 as inserted by Article 1(3) of Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2023/1110 of 6 June 20231;”, and

heading: 4. The Principal Regulations are amended by substituting for Regulation 24
text_raw:
4. The Principal Regulations are amended by substituting for Regulation 24 

(as amended by Regulation 5 of the Regulations of 2023) the following: 

“Transitional provision
text_norm: 4 principal regulation amended substituting regulation 24 (as amended regulation 5 regulation 2023) following transitional provision

title: Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) Regulations 2020 to 2023”
heading: 24. Notwithstanding the provisions of Regulation 20(4), until 27
text_raw:
24. Notwithstanding the provisions of Regulation 20(4), until 27 
August 2023 an operator is not guilty of an offence where he or she 
imports into the State from a third country, without complying with the 
requirement in Regulation 8(1)(m)(ii)(II) or (IV), a consignment of— 

(a) unprocessed apricot kernels from Türkiye intended to be placed 
on the market for the final consumer, which has been dispatched 
to the State, before 27 June 2023, from Türkiye, or from another 
third country if that country is different from the country of origin, 
or 

(b) pistachios and derived products originating in the United States, 
which has been dispatched, before 27 June 2023, to the State from 
Türkiye.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 June, 2023. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

.

title: Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) Regulations 2020 to 2023”
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

These Regulations give further effect to Commission Implementing Regulation 
(EU) 2023/1110 of 6 June 2023 amending Implementing Regulation (EU) 
2019/1793 on the temporary increase of official controls and emergency 
measures governing the entry into the Union of certain goods from certain third 
countries implementing Regulations (EU) 2017/625 and (EC) No. 178/2002 of 
the European Parliament and of the Council. 

These Regulations amend the European Union (Official Controls in relation to 
Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) Regulations 2020 
(S.I. No. 575 of 2020) in the manner specified in these Regulations. 

These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Official Controls in 
relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) 
(Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2023 and come into operation on the date of 
signing.
